0.name: Clear sky
0.description: Cloud development not observed or not observable

1.name: Mainly clear
1.description: Cloud generally dissolving or becoming less developed

2.name: Partly cloudy
2.description: State of sky on the whole unchanged

45.name: Fog
45.description: Fog or ice fog, sky invisible, no appreciable change during the preceding hour

51.name: Light drizzle
51.description: Drizzle, not freezing, continuous, slight at time of ob.

53.name: Drizzle: moderate
53.description: Drizzle, not freezing, continuous, moderate at time of ob.

55.name: Drizzle: dense intensity
55.description: Drizzle, not freezing, continuous, heavy at time of ob.

61.name: Rain: Slight
61.description: Rain, not freezing, continuous, slight at time of ob.

63.name: Rain: moderate
63.description: Rain, not freezing, continuous, moderate at time of ob.

65.name: Rain: heavy intensity
65.description: Rain, not freezing, continuous, heavy at time of ob.

71.name: Snow fall: Slight
71.description: Continuous fall of snowflakes, slight at time of ob.

73.name: Snow fall: moderate
73.description: Continuous fall of snowflakes, moderate at time of ob.

75.name: Snow fall: heavy intensity
75.description: Continuous fall of snowflakes, heavy at time of ob.

95.name: Thunderstorm: Slight or moderate
95.description: Thunderstorm, slight or moderate, without hail, but with rain and/or snow at time of observation

96.name: Thunderstorm with slight hail
96.description: Thunderstorm, slight or moderate, with hail at time of ob.

99.name: Thunderstorm with heavy hail
99.description: Thunderstorm, heavy with hail at time of observation
